tool_description: Enhance your brand recognition and make your QR codes stand out with our QR code image generation API. Easily create QR codes with your logo embedded, and choose from a variety of data types including URL, text, telephone number, email, and SMS. Our API supports multiple formats, ensuring compatibility with any device or application. Add a professional touch to your marketing campaigns and make scanning your QR codes an effortless experience for your customers.
name: QR code generator with logo.
title: QR code generator with logo.

api_list.name: getQrcode

required_parameters.name: logo
required_parameters.description: Enter the url of your logo. The size of the image should be less than 50x50 px.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: Select one of the QR code formats to generate. url,text,telno,mailto,smsto

required_parameters.name: value
required_parameters.description: Enter value as per your QR code type. Eg: url=https://www.google.com,text=Some text,telno=9142545474,smsto=8542487542
